import {React,useEffect} from 'react' import './Cart.css' import 'aos/dist/aos.css'; import img from './../file/download.jpg' import {AiOutlineEye} from 'react-icons/ai' import {BrowserRouter as Router,Switch,Route,Link} from "react-router-dom"; import CartView from './CartView'; const Cart=(props)=>{ var a="#F81E1E",b="#F8642F",c="#900C3F"; var link='/view/'+props.id; return(

{props.head}

{props.viwer}

{props.time}

{props.user}

 ) } export default Cart
